messages.text: What do my recent blood test results mean?

Your recent blood test from February 15, 2025 shows normal cholesterol levels, which is good news. However, your Vitamin D is slightly below the recommended range. This is why Dr. Johnson prescribed Vitamin D supplements (1000 IU daily). Low Vitamin D is common, especially in regions with less sunlight, and can affect bone health and immune function.
When should I take my Vitamin D supplement?

Vitamin D supplements are best absorbed when taken with a meal that contains some fat. Many people find taking it with breakfast or dinner works well. Your prescription indicates 1000 IU daily, so once per day is sufficient.
